pages.text: The $(mob)Pink Slime$() is an artificial monster created by placing $(thing)Pink Slime$() fluid in the world and waiting for a bit. It moves by making sucessive jumps and chases down nearby players, although it is harmless.

$(mob)Pink Slimes$() drop $(item)Pink Slime$() on death. It can be used in any recipe that uses $(l:minecraft_slime)$(mob)Slimeballs$(), but is also used to craft several advanced machines, such as the $(item)Material StoneWork Factory$().
